page.title: 18CHRISTMAS IN SCHOOL.
page.content: The end of Christmas term always means exciting and different activities in school. This year we had a Christmas Concert that had a nativity play in the middle.The juniors and infants worked together.The juniors formed the choir,played the instruments (descant, treble and tenor recorders,xylophone, chime bars,bells,and glockenspiel) and took the main parts in the nativity play, while the infants acted the smaller parts and performed their own play called{The Christmas Tree.}All parents were invited to come.We had three performances.Last week the upper school visited Newcastle to see 'The Voyage Of The Dawn Treader'by C.S.Lewis a play for children given at the{Newcastle Playhouse.}While in Newcastle we visited the{Hancock {Natural History Museum.}We finish the term by having school parties.
